actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on non-high definition color television reception apparatus, having a single liquid crystal display for direct viewing exceeding 37 cm but not exceeding 39 cm.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on non-high definition color television reception apparatus, having a single liquid crystal display for direct viewing exceeding 37 cm but not exceeding 39 cm.

titles.title: A bill to suspend temporarily the duty on non-high definition color television reception apparatus, having a single liquid crystal display for direct viewing exceeding 37 cm but not exceeding 39 cm.
